privacy-first-ai-revolution.name: Michael Rodriguez
privacy-first-ai-revolution.content: Finally, someone who gets it. We've been burned by 'privacy-friendly' vendors before. The on-premise deployment option sealed the deal for us.

privacy-first-ai-revolution.name: Sarah Kim
privacy-first-ai-revolution.content: This approach is exactly what healthcare needs. HIPAA compliance isn't optional for us, and your zero-knowledge architecture is brilliant.

transforming-construction-with-ai.name: Dave Thompson
transforming-construction-with-ai.content: We implemented this on three sites last month. Already caught two near-misses that could have been serious. This tech is literally saving lives.
